plot outline: Shankar, an auto driver, finds a dog in his rickshaw one day. Feeling repulsive in the beginning, Slowly Shankar starts to warm to the canine. Their emotional bond becomes so strong that they become the talk of the town. But his wife Kavitha begins to feel jealous. Naanu Mutthu Gunda is a heartwarming story about these three lives coming together.
title: Naanu Matthu Gunda
